engine.title: Engine repair
engine.desc: We carry out engine inspection, repair, overhaul, engine replacement. We carry out repair work on such components as the air purification system, exhaust system, gas distribution mechanism, lubrication system. Replacement and / or repair of the cylinder block, pistons, crankshaft.

engine.item: removal and installation of cylinder head
disassembly and assembly of cylinder head
removal and installation of the engine

transmission.title: Transmission repair
transmission.desc: Transmission diagnostics, replacement of parts, replacement of the gearbox if necessary. Assembly and disassembly of the gearbox, both automatic and manual. Checkpoint diagnostics, dismantling and disassembly of the system, inspection of all components, installation of the system and adjustment. Maintenance of the gearbox, taking into account all functional features.

transmission.item: removal and installation of manual transmission / automatic transmission
disassembly and assembly of manual transmission / automatic transmission
removal and installation of the engine

suspension.title: Suspension
suspension.desc: Inspection of the running gear, repair and replacement of axle beams, frames, rear and front suspension. Dismantling of shock absorbers, replacement of hubs, silent blocks, elimination of backlash between moving parts.

suspension.item: removal and installation of the subframe
disassembly and assembly of the shock absorber strut
removal and installation of shock absorber

electronics.title: Electronics
electronics.desc: We carry out a check of the entire electrical system of the car, we will replace and / or repair the failed wiring nodes. We provide lighting replacement services. We will also equip your car with additional equipment at the most affordable price.

steering.title: Steering
steering.desc: The causes of a steering failure can be different: both low quality is expensive, and the maximum service life of the system and many others. In the event of various external signs of breakdown, it is necessary to carry out an inspection of the steering system, which you can do with us.

fuel.title: Fuel system
fuel.desc: Fuel system malfunctions are always dangerous and fraught with costly repairs. In turn, refueling with low-quality fuel is one of the main causes of fuel system malfunctions. But with regular diagnosis, these problems can be avoided. And we are ready to fully provide it to you.

brake.title: Brake system
brake.desc: We provide a full range of fuel system repair services. We will quickly and inexpensively replace brake pads, replace pipes and hoses, bleed the system, replace brake discs and drums, caliper guides and much more.

ignition.title: Ignition system
ignition.desc: There are enough problems in the operation of the ignition system and they can manifest themselves in different ways. But we are ready to take on any of them. After a thorough check, we will establish the cause of the breakdown and offer the most optimal solutions to the problem without unnecessary worries and costs.

cooling.title: Cooling system
cooling.desc: Malfunctions of the cooling system can lead to engine failure, and in some cases it may require a major overhaul. The system allows the engine to operate at optimal temperature, and even minor malfunctions can cause serious damage. We provide high-quality service to eliminate problems in the operation of the cooling system.
